title: Have You Booked a Reservation for Your Trip Through Airport Security?
sub_head: Airports across the country are allowing passengers to make appointments for TSA screening, partly in response to pandemic travel stresses
body:
Passengers at some airports have another task to add to their preflight checklists: Reserve a time to go through airport security.
Airport directors say the reservation programs are intended to give travelers more control over the airport experience, partly in response to the stresses of travel during the pandemic. Vacationers have had to navigate more canceled flights and unruly passengers, along with uncertainty caused by the Covid-19 pandemic and emerging variants.
